description: Three star because I can't figure out how to use it so maybe it's good maybe it's not. I use command line apps so it's not like I am command line illiterate, I just can't find anything that tells me how to start the music I want to listen to. I have found a lot of other information on usage but nothing that helps me listen to music.
summary: I am too stupid to use it

Kindly make sure it is not designed for the desktop machine like VLC. It is a MPD kind, Just install mopidy along with musicbox_webclient and mpd provided by mopidy and open the URL http://ipaddress:6680 to get the user interface.
summary: Awesome app for the headless machine
